text: And I beheld, and, lo, The words in brackets are added from the Syriac.  [this wind caused to come up from the midst of the sea as it were the likeness of a man, and I beheld, and, lo,] that man So the Syriac. The Latin has grew strong  flew with the clouds of heaven: and when he turned his countenance to look, all things trembled that were seen under him.
